metadata.name: OVO 1
metadata.description:
OVOs are characters that result from mixed basic forms, that show the duality of a whole. Nothing is completely round and happy, nor sharp and sad. Nobody behaves the same way in every different situation. That's the reason why the OVOs are looking for themselves, and like everybody else, they are in continuous transformation, without losing their core essence. 

Unique Edition
A better quality video will be also provided
More info https://www.juandiazfaes.com/en
